data.price: 我降示可以为信士们治疗和给他们以恩惠的《古兰经》，它只会使不信道者更加亏折。
data.arabic: وَنُنَزِّلُ مِنَ ٱلۡقُرۡءَانِ مَا هُوَ شِفَآءٞ وَرَحۡمَةٞ لِّلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ وَلَا يَزِيدُ ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ إِلَّا خَسَارٗا

meta.transliteration: wanunazzilu mina al-qur'āni mā huwa shifāon waraḥmatun lil'mu'minīna walā yazīdu al-ẓālimīna illā khasāran

dua.name: Dua for Emotional Healing
dua.significanceReason: Seeks spiritual and emotional healing, relief from psychological distress. Frequently used for mental health and emotional well-being.

version.title: Chinese Translation - Muhammad Makin
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Chinese by Muhammad Makin. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.
